fr.liglab.adele.icasa.location

Interface ZoneListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IcasaListener, ZonePropListener
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MultiEventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UPnPPhotometerProxyImpl

    public interface ZoneListener
extends ZonePropListener
    A listener of zones
    Author:
    Gabriel Pedraza Ferreira

    • Method Detail

      • zoneAdded

        void zoneAdded(Zone zone)
        Called callback when a new zone has been added. This method will not be called for added zones previous the zone listener registration.
        Parameters:
        zone - The new zone.

      • zoneRemoved

        void zoneRemoved(Zone zone)
        Called callback when a zone is removed.
        Parameters:
        zone -

      • zoneMoved

        void zoneMoved(Zone zone,
             Position oldPosition)
        Called callback when the zone has move.
        Parameters:
        zone - The zone that has move.
        oldPosition - The old top-left relative position.

      • zoneResized

        void zoneResized(Zone zone)
        Called callback when a zone has been resized.
        Parameters:
        zone - The resized zone.

      • zoneParentModified

        void zoneParentModified(Zone zone,
                      Zone oldParentZone)
        Called callback when adding a parent to an existent zone.
        Parameters:
        zone - The zone with new parent.
        oldParentZone - The old parent of the zone. null for the first time.
